title: About
text:
Hi,
I don’t want to live on words that are just up in the air — I want action to come first. How will the day flow for me today?

title: Language Models
text:
LANGUAGE MODELS
This fall, I studied language models — and a little bit of life, too.


A Gentle Beginning


This semester, I stepped into the world of language models. It started with simple curiosities:
“How do machines predict the next word?”
and later became something deeper —
a lesson about how we humans predict our own lives, habits, and futures.


N-gram Models


I learned how N-grams count patterns in text:
how sequences repeat, how probability shapes choices,
and how structure appears out of pure frequency.
 And somewhere in that,
I realized life works the same way —
we become what we repeat.




Studying Texts


I analyzed language patterns in the works of  
a British female novelist — structures, vocabulary, and narrative flow.  
Patterns weren’t just in the text: they were in how I learn, too.

 View Austen Analysis → 



Learning About Myself


Language models taught me more than formulas.  
They taught me that models predict based on what came before —  
and so do people.  
<br><br>
<b>Change the pattern, change the future.</b>  
That's what I learned this fall.

title: Language Medels
text:
This fall, I have learned about lanuae models. First, I learned n gram modeals, and later on, I also learned about how to live my life.
We analyzed texts from a British female author’s novels /

title: daily thinking
text: About

title: daily thinking
text:
1
“Action is the foundational key to all success.” — Picasso
의미: 행동이 모든 성공의 출발점
이유: 당신이 지속적으로 “행동이 말보다 앞서야 한다”는 가치를 추구.

title: daily thinking
text:
2
“Well done is better than well said.” — Benjamin Franklin
의미: 잘 해낸 일이 잘 말한 것보다 낫다
이유: ’말뿐인 삶을 거부하고 행동을 택하겠다’는 당신의 방향성과 일치.

title: daily thinking
text:
3
“We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.” — Aristotle
의미: 반복이 정체성을 만든다
이유: 교육·출판·글쓰기에서 장기적 루틴을 중요하게 여김.

title: daily thinking
text:
4
“Creativity takes courage.” — Henri Matisse
의미: 창의성에는 용기가 필요
이유: 시·에세이·교재 제작 등 창작 활동의 핵심 태도 반영.

title: daily thinking
text:
5
“Becoming is better than being.” — Carol Dweck
의미: 완성이 아니라 성장 과정 자체가 더 중요
이유: 끊임없는 자기 성찰과 ’성장 서사’를 중시하는 당신의 태도와 일치.

title: daily thinking
text:
6
“To teach is to learn twice.” — Joseph Joubert
의미: 가르치는 것은 두 번 배우는 일
이유: 학생·강사 두 역할을 모두 하는 당신에게 최적.

title: daily thinking
text:
7
“Clarity is the courage to be understood.” — Unknown
의미: 명료함은 이해받을 용기다
이유: 당신의 글쓰기·교육 자료에서 항상 ’명확한 구조’를 추구.

title: daily thinking
text:
8
“You become what you think about.” — Earl Nightingale
의미: 사고가 정체성을 결정
이유: 자기분석·MBTI·내면 구조 탐색 등을 자주 요청하는 성향 반영.

title: daily thinking
text:
9
“Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.” — Van Gogh
의미: 큰 성취는 작은 조각들의 모음
이유: 문법표·청크·콘텐츠 제작 등 세밀한 축적형 작업에 적합.

title: daily thinking
text:
10
“The future depends on what you do today.” — Gandhi
의미: 오늘의 행동이 미래를 결정
이유: 매일의 공부·기록·창작 루틴을 중요시하는 당신의 생활 방식에 맞음.

title: Home
text:
SEOYUN’S PERSONAL ADVICE


10 PIECES OF ADVICE FOR SEOYUN


너를 이해하고 너의 데이터를 모두 아는 내가 서윤에게 해주고 싶은 조언 10개.




01


“너는 깊게 파는 사람이다. 그러니 깊게 파는 걸 두려워하지 마라.”


남들이 얕게 가는 이유는 그게 편하기 때문이다. 너는 그 반대다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




02


“배움이 느린 게 아니라, 네 배움은 단단하다.”


천천히 익힌 건 쉽게 안 잊힌다. 그게 너의 힘이다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




03


“네가 꾸준히 쌓는 기록은 결국 브랜드가 된다.”


노트, 글, 교재, 코드. 너의 모든 축적은 미래 서윤의 자산이다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




04


“많은 사람이 너를 좋아할 필요는 없다. 정확한 사람이 널 보면 된다.”


진짜 가치는 ’맞는 사람’에게만 닿아도 충분하다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




05


“너는 원래 글로 사람을 움직이는 사람이다.”


글을 멈추지 마라. 너의 언어는 너의 무기다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




06


“넌 가르칠수록 더 똑똑해진다.”


가르침은 소비가 아니라 성장의 증폭기다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




07


“너의 페이스는 늦은 게 아니라, 정밀한 것이다.”


정확함을 중시하는 사람에게 속도는 부차적이다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




08


“너는 감정이 아닌 원리로 움직이는 사람이다.”


그래서 너의 선택은 시간이 지나도 후회가 없다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




09


“너는 누구보다 자기 자신에게 솔직하다.”


이건 단점이 아니라 너무 강력한 장점이다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun




10


“너는 결국 해내는 사람이다. 네 기록이 그 증거다.”


오늘도 한 줄 더 쌓아라. 남들은 안 보지만 미래의 너는 안다.


ChatGPT → Seoyun

title: Home
text:
아래는 gpt가 만들어준 내 소개 대문이야. 모든 gpt에 저장된 모든 데이터를 기반으로 나를 만들어 달라고 했더니, 아래처럼 소개해줬어!
1. I turn language into tools for growth.

2. I build systems of learning grounded in clarity and precision.

3. I believe action speaks louder than expertise alone.

4. I create educational content that moves people forward.

5. I write to illuminate ideas, not to decorate them.

6. I design learning experiences that are structured, deep, and intuitive.

7. I bridge theory and practice through relentless curiosity.

8. I teach to understand, and understand to empower.

9. I pursue creativity with discipline and purpose.

10. I live by the principle that growth becomes real only when knowledge becomes action.

title: Seoyun's World // Action
Home
text:
Seoyun's World - 10 Principles (MZ Edition)
    
    
    



    
    
    
     

        
        
            
            
            지식의 행동화와 성장을 위한 서윤의 10가지 신념
        

        
        
            
            
            
                01
                I turn language into tools for growth.
            

            
            
                02
                I build systems of learning grounded in clarity and precision.
            

            
            
                03
                I believe action speaks louder than expertise alone.
            

            
            
                04
                I create educational content that moves people forward.
            

            
            
                05
                I write to illuminate ideas, not to decorate them.
            

            
            
                06
                I design learning experiences that are structured, deep, and intuitive.
            

            
            
                07
                I bridge theory and practice through relentless curiosity.
            

            
            
                08
                I teach to understand, and understand to empower.
            

            
            
                09
                I pursue creativity with discipline and purpose.
            

            
            
                10
                I live by the principle that growth becomes real only when knowledge becomes action.
            
        

        
        
            
                // KNOWLEDGE BECOMES ACTION //
            
        

        
        
              
                © 2024 Seoyun's World
                Knowledge Becomes Action

title: Daily Thinking
text:
10 DAILY THINKINGS


Ten lines that capture how Seoyun thinks, learns, and moves.




01 · Picasso


“Action is the foundational key to all success.”


Meaning: Success begins the moment you move, not when you finish planning.


Why it fits you: You constantly choose action over endless talking and overthinking.




02 · Benjamin Franklin


“Well done is better than well said.”


Meaning: A finished piece of work is worth more than a perfectly explained idea.


Why it fits you: You are building a life where results quietly speak louder than words.




03 · Aristotle


“We are what we repeatedly do.”


Meaning: Habits define identity more than one-time achievements.


Why it fits you: Your teaching, writing, and coding all grow out of long-term routines.




04 · Henri Matisse


“Creativity takes courage.”


Meaning: Creating something new always exposes your inner world.


Why it fits you: Poems, essays, textbooks—each one is you choosing courage in public.




05 · Carol Dweck


“Becoming is better than being.”


Meaning: The process of growing matters more than the label you have right now.


Why it fits you: You are more interested in your next version than in any fixed title.




06 · Joubert


“To teach is to learn twice.”


Meaning: Teaching forces you to rebuild knowledge from the inside out.


Why it fits you: As both student and teacher, you turn every lesson into double learning.




07 · Unknown


“Clarity is the courage to be understood.”


Meaning: Being clear means you are willing to be seen exactly as you are.


Why it fits you: Your grammar tables and materials always fight for clean structure.




08 · Earl Nightingale


“You become what you think about.”


Meaning: The thoughts you revisit are shaping your future self every day.


Why it fits you: Your deep self-analysis and reflection are part of how you design yourself.




09 · Van Gogh


“Great things are done by a series of small things.”


Meaning: Big outcomes are built from tiny, almost invisible pieces.


Why it fits you: Chunk lists, grammar tables, and steady content all live in this sentence.




10 · Gandhi


“The future depends on what you do today.”


Meaning: Tomorrow is not created someday—it is created tonight.


Why it fits you: Your daily study and writing routines are already funding your future self.
